title: A Review of Episode 1206 Mike Ward
description:
Mike Ward is a Canadian comedian and host of “2 Drink Minimum” podcast. He has been sued for a joke he made years ago that brings up the question of what is free speech. Joe and Mike have a great conversation addressing this issue.

Enjoy my review folks!

Please email me with any suggestions and questions for future Reviews:
